description: Warm, welcoming, intimate and friendly – it’s easy to get carried away with the adjectives when describing this restaurant housed in a 16C farmhouse! This is the perfect choice for anyone looking for excellent and typical regional cuisine, accompanied by an equally good choice of wines. A visit to the wine cellar is highly recommended.
